name: Whiteboard Challenge Template
description:
A simple template to help you go through a whiteboard challenge / design exercise that's common when interviewing.


Built on the framework laid out in the book Solving Product Design Exercises.


Check out Ugly Unicorns awesome video if you want to see in-depth description of how to use it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_g7pc8WkJfY&t=15s
